message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to make an offer for the product?
I'm interested in the product, but $25000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $18000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still a bit above $18000. Would you be willing to consider $20000?
I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $19000?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. Would you be willing to meet me at $21000?
I'm still not comfortable with $21000. Would you be willing to consider a price of $19500?
I'm not willing to go as low as $19500, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $20250. This is my final concession, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $19000?
